ygData.subject: RE: Pzygin
ygData.msgSnippet: Varsoon is much lower, in the teens, but when you kill Varsoon, Varsoon the Undying spawns.  He looks like a zombie and is MUCH tougher.  He was blue to me at
ygData.messageBody:
Varsoon is much lower, in the teens, but when you kill Varsoon, Varsoon the
Undying spawns. He looks like a zombie and is MUCH tougher. He was blue to
me at 35, so not sure exactly his level. I wasn't able to take him solo,
that's for sure. I heard that after he chased me running and screaming like
a girl into surefall glade, he was killed by a level 50 wiz, who I guess had
killed Varsoon in the first place.

Telon on E'ci
> ----------
> From: Doug Sorensen[SMTP:belgarth_of_surefall@...]
> Reply To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, September 08, 1999 4:46 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Pzygin
>
> From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
>
> --- MFerrulo@... wrote:

> > Daylight Time,

> >
> > <<
> > He is in the mini graveyard between the Surefall
> > and
> > Blackburrow entrances. Not sure of his spawn rate
> > but
> > Varsoon is an alternate necro that spawns there.
> > >>
> >
> >
> > What lvls are Varsoon and Pyzgin? I seek revenge
> > upon Varsoon for an earlier
> > death.
> >
> > Wizaro Wrathcaster
> > Solusek Ro
>
> I think Varsoon is about level 30 and Pzygin is about
> 20.
>
> Belgarth
